name: Paper Asteroids
description:
I bet you always wanted to know how could it be to play asteroids in your notebook when you are boring.

Paper Asteroids will allow you to play this funny classic. :D 

I'm working on this project to learn the mechanics' of a small game made only with C++ and Blit3D. It's been an exciting and joyful experience for me as a developer and as a fan of games since I was a child.

I hope this game is the beginning of a long and successful path as a Game Developer.

Current version: 0.1
